name: Prototip: Garez
desc: Kara Kaya Demirci Ocağında dövülmüş kadim bir kılıç, bununla kayaları bile yarmak çocuk oyuncağı.

desc.text:
Liyue'nin silah deposundan kadim bir prototip kılıç. Seri numarası silinmiş ve üretim tarihini teyit edebilecek hiçbir kayıt yok.
Dönen bulut motifi kılıcın gövdesine kazınmış ve bu da kılıç havada savruldukça gün ışığında ona belli belirsiz altın bir parıltı veriyor.
Bu silahı yapan kılıç zanaatkarlarının, yeteneklerini bütünüyle kullandığı ve yenilikçi düşünmek zorunda kaldığı söylenir.
Yun ailesinin demirci ocağının başındaki Yun Hui, ünlü zanaatkar Han Wu'yla yakınlaştı. Her iki tarafın da uzmanlığı birleşince, Han Wu basitçe "prototipler" adı verilen yeni bir silah serisi için tasarımlar yaptı.
Bu tasarımla ortaya çıkan ilk kılıç, halihazırda korkutucu bir silah hissi veriyordu.
Han Wu Tianheng Dağı'nda kılıcı denerken, onu yanlışlıkla yere düşürdü.
Kılıç ise bir enerji girdabı yarattı ve dağdaki sağlam bir kayada otuz santimetre derinliğinde delik açarak yanıt verdi.
Han Wu bunu göklerden gelen bir işaret olarak yorumladı: "Bu kılıcın ismi kaya yok edici Garez olmalı."
Bu kılıç, dağları temelinden sarsıyor ve ucunda bin zirvenin gücünü taşıyor.
Kayaları sanki bir tereyağı gibi ikiye bölen bu kılıç, Liyue'de kendinden sonra yapılmış olan tüm kılıçların temelini oluşturuyor.

value.text: Normal veya Yüklü Saldırılarla darbe vurduğunda, 6 saniyeliğine Saldırı ve Savunmayı <color=#37ffff>%4/5/6/7/8</color> artırır. 4 kademeye kadar birikir. Bu etki 0,3 saniyede bir uygulanabilir.

value.name: Kuzey Diyarı Kılıç Prototipi
value.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

value.name: Su Kristal Parçası
value.desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

value.name: Beyaz Demir Parçası
value.desc: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.

materials.name: Sis Kaplı Kurşun Cevher
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Jueyun Karst is the realm of the mighty and illuminated adepti. But other than the ability to control the elements of the world, Jueyun Karst is also home to three other untold secrets: Alchemy, Sigils, and Sub-Space Creation.

materials.name: Sis Otu Poleni
materials.desc: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

materials.name: Acemi Asker Nişanı
materials.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

materials.name: Sis Kaplı Cıva Cevher
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
With Fulu (Sigils), the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols, and with Waijing (Sub-Space Creation) they can fashion a cosmic paradise with the power of their minds. The manufacture of elixirs, however, has always been shrouded in mystery, for certain death follows for any who swallow them.

materials.name: Sis Otu Poleni
materials.desc: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

materials.name: Acemi Asker Nişanı
materials.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

materials.name: Sis Kaplı Cıva Cevher
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
With Fulu (Sigils), the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols, and with Waijing (Sub-Space Creation) they can fashion a cosmic paradise with the power of their minds. The manufacture of elixirs, however, has always been shrouded in mystery, for certain death follows for any who swallow them.

materials.name: Sis Otu
materials.desc: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.

materials.name: Çavuş Nişanı
materials.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

materials.name: Sis Kaplı Altın Cevher
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Elixirs are in fact pills made from metal alloys. They were created by the adepti, and are able to grant weapons transcendent powers. However, they are rarely seen in the world due to the hubris of the practitioners of martial arts, who prized the ways of combat over the paths of the adepti.

materials.name: Sis Otu
materials.desc: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.

materials.name: Çavuş Nişanı
materials.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

materials.name: Sis Kaplı Altın Cevher
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Elixirs are in fact pills made from metal alloys. They were created by the adepti, and are able to grant weapons transcendent powers. However, they are rarely seen in the world due to the hubris of the practitioners of martial arts, who prized the ways of combat over the paths of the adepti.

materials.name: Sis Otu Fitili
materials.desc: A rare bundle of Mist Grass that gives off a faint glow. Those who carry it invite both the Cicins and misfortune.

materials.name: Subay Nişanı
materials.desc: An insignia to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.

materials.name: Sis Kaplı Üstün Cevher
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
An elixir of the highest quality. It embodies a state of intertwining order and chaos, and is said to mirror how the world was when it was first created. Of course, a certain someone knows that this was not the case.

materials.name: Sis Otu Fitili
materials.desc: A rare bundle of Mist Grass that gives off a faint glow. Those who carry it invite both the Cicins and misfortune.
